author: Shahedeen Azam
text:
Looking at the hatred being expewed against Muslims because of what that scum surya “revealed”, I understand why Modi is so confident that he will suffer no loss of political credibility after the covid crisis . He knows he was voted for his “Viraat Roop “.
#TejasviSuryaExposed

author: Shahedeen Azam
Shahedeen Azam
text:
If govt has the right to know the source of our earning why shouldn't we have the right to know the source of political parties earnings? If we aren't hiding why are they hiding! 
#ElectoralBonds
